channel.title: Tor browser
channel.description:
Hello,
I Tried to open tor browser earlier and had a few issues, when I eventually got it to open it was the new firefox browser which I can remember installing but wasnt an issue. shut down whonix and opened up a few hours later and now when I try to run Tor it keeps saying 'tor browser exited abnormally'
Thanks for the help.

item.title: Tor browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Got latest Whonix version or got latest updates?

Otherwise… Dunno. Damaged profile perhaps?

Firefox crashed and still running? Try this.

(Reboot also makes sure none is running anymore.)

Downloading a new one using torbrowser-updater should also solve it?

Read full topic
